reviews.review: Наверно, одна из самых завораживающих игр что я играла. Хороший эпизод и интересный конец, даже если в конце опечалился, что игра закончилась, ты можешь поиграть с друзьями и это, как бы, продолжение сего эпизода. Отличная игра 1000000000000+

This game is the most difficult puzzle game I've been ever played, and this is one reason why I bought it.
The second reason is because of the amazing story behind it that makes the puzzles more fun to play.
Also, I like the idea behind it, of taking a rifle that can teleport you from a place to another place, and make it to more elaborate tool, that can control your speed, move objectives and much more!
Inconclution I recommend to buy this amazing adventure and puzzle game, that includes a lot of amzing gadgets and a lot of fun!

Portal 2 вышел через 3 года после первого и как сказал сам директор Valve Гейб это лучшая игра в истории компании.

Многие конечно бы поспорили но игра стала гораздо продвинутей первой части, нам открыли новые возможности в использолвании пушки, добавили новые вещества (разноцветный гель) без которых не пройти уровни. Как и в случае с L4D первый портал тоже назвали своеобразным эксперементом. А Portal 2 уже основной игрой.

Одна из основных особенностей это кооператив, теперь стало возможно пройти испытания в паре. В основном геймплей остался тем же пушкой создаем дыру входим выходим уровень проходим. И так до самого финала где нас ждёт "спасение".

Тот факт что игру называют лучшей в истории Valve доказывает что надо играть. Особенно любителям ломать мозг.
KAUFEN! SPIELEN! NOCHMAL SPIELEN!

After 110 hours into the game, and beating every singleplayer and some multiplayer community challenges, as well as replaying the coop campaign and as of now unfinished into the multiverse community campaign, multiple times, i can safely say that i have gotten more than my moneysworth out of this game. If you want some real challenges, play the community perputual testing inetitive ones. The main two campaigns will probably last you a good 10 hours. (Depending on how long it takes you to figure out each puzzle and if you have a friend who has done them before it may be shorter.) I must say that you shouldent listen to the idiots complaining about how lineir the levels are, all of portal 1s levels where just as linier, if not more so. This isnt an open world game, its not supost to be. It is a puzzle FPS, and a great one at that. I must say that by taking away all of the posibilitys of failure in the majority of levels and making only the right way avalible, it is tonnes easier in some areas, but then again there are frustratingly hard areas that at some points made me want to tear my hair out. Its a fun experience and I'm not taking any actual time to proofread/use any real grammar soplease exusse that. Overall its a fun game, not for all, but for many.

One of My Favorite Games of All Time. I could play this forever.

The singleplayer has a rich and hilarious story. The levels are challenging and the way they're executed really sucks you into the game. Much more gameplay than the first game too. The multiplayer is great too. It requires both players thinking outside the box and working together constantly. It's a lot of fun I recommend playing it.

Portal 2 is an awesome puzzle game, with an amazing storyline to continue the already incredible story of Chell in the first Portal. Also many secret rooms hidden inside. Amazing graphics. I reccomend this to anyone in there right mind... right after they beat the first Portal.

This is a very nice game. The plot is outstanding with all those twists and easter eggs. You can explore this world of creativity with portals, by the way, the co-op mode is helpful for learning to communicate with people and to play together, your social skills will improve a lot. The graphics are amazing and the gameplay is breathtaking. I really recommend you to buy this game, it's worth it's money, trust me. Have fun playing!

The only game where a play through cannot ruin the impact of its morbid but stellar storyline.

-Shot two portals on different walls
-Insulted by GLaDOS for what seemed like eternity
-Shot to near death by turrets
-Fell thousands of feet underground
-Almost drowned
-Discovered eerie drawings on the wall
-Found my freedom

11/10 -Would be imprisoned in Aperture Science again :)

A great puzzle game with charm. Levels feel a bit more fiddly and restrained than Portal 1, but perhaps they had trouble making difficult puzzles when the levels were less restrictive.

Probably near infinite levels to play now that the level editor has been out for a while.
